pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.4_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.5_0: “kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.7_2: caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.11_2: caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.14_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.15.1_0: “Yā pana bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.18_0: ‘māyye, kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ avaca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.19_0: chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.20_0: Ayyā kho chandāpi gaccheyya, dosāpi gaccheyya, mohāpi gaccheyya, bhayāpi gaccheyyā’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.21_0: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.21_1: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.22_0: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṁ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.23_0: no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṁ dhammaṁ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṁ saṅghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.16_0: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.17_0: “māyye, kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ avaca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.19_0: Ayyā kho chandāpi gaccheyya …pe… bhayāpi gaccheyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.26_0: “māyye, kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ avaca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.28_0: Ayyā kho chandāpi gaccheyya …pe… bhayāpi gaccheyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.36_1: Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.37_0: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo… pe… bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.39_1: saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.42_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.45_0: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.46_0: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.50_0: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṅghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.51_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.60_0: yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya āpajjati, na saha vatthujjhācārā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.2.1_0: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.2.2_0: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.2.3_0: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
